Bash(~/.claude/skills/quant-ralph-loop/scripts/setup-quant-ralph-loop.sh "Full Platform Audit using react-best-practices and web-design-guidelines skills.

AUDIT SCOPE \(894 TypeScript files\):
1. src/components/ - React components \(performance + accessibility\)
2. src/app/ - Next.js pages and API routes
3. src/lib/ - Utilities and shared code
4. src/hooks/ - Custom React hooks

AUDIT CHECKLIST:

## React Performance \(react-best-practices\)
- [ ] Barrel imports from lucide-react \(bundle size\)
- [ ] Missing React.memo\(\) on list item components
- [ ] Functions recreated on every render \(should use useCallback\)
- [ ] Objects recreated on every render \(should use useMemo\)
- [ ] Missing key props or using index as key
- [ ] Heavy components that should use dynamic imports
- [ ] Unnecessary re-renders from prop drilling

## Accessibility \(web-design-guidelines\)
- [ ] Icon-only buttons missing aria-label
- [ ] Images missing alt text
- [ ] Form inputs missing labels
- [ ] Missing focus states
- [ ] Interactive divs instead of buttons
- [ ] Missing heading hierarchy

## Code Quality
- [ ] Duplicate code that should be extracted
- [ ] Large components that should be split
- [ ] Missing TypeScript types \(using ''any''\)
- [ ] Console.log statements in production code

OUTPUT FORMAT:
Create a file at docs/PLATFORM_AUDIT.md with:
1. Executive summary
2. Critical issues \(must fix\)
3. High priority issues
4. Medium priority issues  
5. Low priority improvements
6. Recommended refactoring

Output <promise>AUDIT COMPLETE</promise> when the full audit is done and documented." --max-iterations 20 --completion-promise "AUDIT COMPLETE")
